CustomField.formula: IF( Mailing_Address_Street__c != null,Mailing_Address_Street__c&', ','')& IF( Mailing_Address_City__c != null,Mailing_Address_City__c&', ','')& IF( Future_Notification_Address_State__c != null,Future_Notification_Address_State__c &' ','')& IF( Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Postal_Code__c != null,Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Postal_Code__c&', ','')& IF( Mailing_Country__c != null,Mailing_Country__c,'')
